articles.title: European defense stocks lift markets higher; Best day for BAE Systems since 2022 - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks moved higher Monday as a number of defense stocks soared.

articles.title: European leaders regroup in Paris for strategy huddle after Trump diplomatic blitz on Ukraine - The Associated Press
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron has called leaders from key European Union nations and the United Kingdom to his ornate Elysee Palace for an emergency meeting Monday. He wants to discuss how to deal with the Trump administration and step up plans to increase…

articles.author: Zoya Sheftalovich
articles.title: UK ‘ready’ to send peacekeepers to Ukraine, PM Starmer says - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ahead of a crunch meeting in Paris on Monday, the U.K. leader commits to putting British troops in harm’s way to secure a lasting peace in Ukraine.
articles.content: "We must be clear that peace cannot come at any cost," Starmer said. "Ukraine must be at the table in these negotiations, because anything less would accept Putins position that Ukraine is not a real… [+1528 chars]
